title: B&M 4XPKS Stainless Steel Frog and Fish Spear, 7-Inch
features: Ultra Light One-Piece Slabtail Casting Rod
Quality craftsmanship and materials make this product a must have for any fisherman
description: The BandM 4XPKS Stainless Steel Frog and Fish Spear is hand-forged from stainless steel, making it a durable investment for spear fishermen around the world. Needle-sharp points and barbs are strong and built to last through the generations. The BandM 4XPKS Stainless Steel Frog and Fish Spear measures 7-Inch long by 3.5-Inch wide. BandM is the producer of high-quality fishing necessities with over 60 years of expertise in the fishing industry.
